summary: Simpler is an AI productivity app that helps users organize and prioritize tasks so they can focus on what truly matters.

useCaseText: Make AI music covers with your favorite artists
summary: Voicify is a platform that allows users to generate custom songs using AI in seconds featuring their favorite artists' styles. It offers a unique experience for music production and remixing.

useCaseText: Create personalized graphic novels with text prompts.
summary: XR Books offers an AI-driven platform that creates personalized graphic novels, such as comics and anime. The AI-generated stories are based on user-provided text prompts and can be exported in various formats. Users can also customize generated stories with additional chapters or updates. No technical or design skills are needed to use the platform and it offers both free and paid plans. Contact info@extendedrealitybooks.com for more information.

Jotgenius is an AI powered content generator that helps create unique and engaging content to increase conversions and drive sales. It has over 50 templates to automate content creation, and offers simple pricing plans for everyone.

useCaseText: Enhanced and upscaled photos for businesses with API.
summary: Viesus is a cloud-based AI solution that enhances and upscales photos with accuracy and speed. It is packed with features, accessible through a web app and API access, and has a powerful API for bulk image enhancements. Used by businesses of all sizes worldwide, Viesus offers a free trial to try it out.

useCaseText: Learn GPT language model via educational platform.
summary: LearnGPT is a new tool that allows users to generate fiction stories.

useCaseText: Eng. platform: exercises, tests, cards, and role-plays.
summary: Grammar AI is an AI-powered English learning platform that provides personalized learning experiences for users of all levels. It offers exercises and activities to help with grammar, vocabulary, pronunciation, listening and comprehension. It also has a secure payment gateway and takes the privacy and security of user information seriously. There is a free trial available for those wanting to explore before subscribing, as well as an affiliate program.

useCaseText: Personalized virtual assistant for customer service.
summary: AutoGPT AI Chatbot - MagicChat is an AI assistant powered by ChatGPT Turbo and GPT-4, using advanced AI technology to deliver any AI-powered search, conversation, text completion, and other features. It can do many tasks such as write anything from tweets to essays, translate complex text into simpler concepts, create code with natural language, answer questions based on existing knowledge, create interview questions and turn meeting notes into a summary. It has a user-friendly interface and intuitive design. It is better and more affordable than the competition.

Gnbly is an AI assistant that can help you book restaurant reservations, call service providers, and do phone screenings. It can also navigate through a phone system and acquire information such as store hours, product availability, and pricing details. It is priced to support a wide range of use cases from personal assistant to Enterprise support dispatcher. Contact hello@gnbly.com for more information or join the Discord server @HelloGnbly for only $3.

useCaseText: Personalized outreach and backlink management platform.
summary: BacklinkGPT.com is an AI-powered platform that helps users generate personalized outreach messages for link-building campaigns, monitor progress, and optimize their strategy. It utilizes advanced AI technology to create highly effective outreach messages, helping users acquire more backlinks and improve their website's performance. The platform streamlines the process by automatically identifying the author, analyzing the website to uncover relevant interests and angles, and obtaining their contact details from sources like email, LinkedIn, and Twitter. Additionally, it leverages the power of AI and large language models like GPT-3 to craft personalized and relevant outreach messages.
